name: giis
body:
### gET iT i sAY. giis 
gET iT i sAY.giis is a text based file recovery tool.Once you install giis,files on your disk can be recovered using giis.But Those files which deleted before the installation giis can't be recovered using giis.

User has the option to choose directories too.Add only those directories where you will store important data.(adding directories like /tmp gives giis overhead and installation will take long time).It can recovers a deleted file and restores in it's original directory,if path exists.It recovers dropped 
database tables.


Minimum the directories you choose will increases the giis performance.
####Need to Update?
giis is updated every 20 minutes. To update giis manually try giis -u so that all newly created files and folder get eligible for recovery.
See INSTALL file for more.

Note : giis is an admin tool.So the user should have root user rights to execute it.

### How to install
see INSTALL file


### User Guide and Documents
For "Ext3/Ext2 File System internals" and "Implementation of giis" refer docs directory.

For User guide check out www.giis.co.in/giis_user_guide.html

For DB recovery screenshots : www.giis.co.in/giis_mysql_screenshots.html

For more manuals,checkout  www.giis.co.in/manuals.html

### Support
Your donations will make a __huge__ difference and will allow me to write more application for free :)


You can get me at <lakshmipathi.g@giis.co.in>
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
